entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Partly cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Periods of rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 10 April 2023
